Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Class that starts single or multiplayer games. Contains waiting room for players that choose the multiplayer game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Server()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void add​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
    Adds a client handler waiting for a multiplayer game to start in the list if client handlers.
    void checkStart()  
    static void clearParticipants()  
    static java.lang.Integer getPlayersNumber()
    Number of players waiting for the game to start
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    static boolean nicknameAlreadyExist​(java.lang.String nickname)
    Invoked each time a multiplayer player logs in the game.
    static void printCurrentPlayers()  
    static void removeClientHandler​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
    If a multiplayer player waiting for a multiplayer game to start decides to exit the waiting room, the following method is invoked and the client is removed from the list of clients waiting for the game to start.
    static void sendParticipantsNumberUpdate()
    Updates clients about the number af participants waiting for the game to start

    Invoked to start the multiplayer game.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.IOException
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • checkStart

      public void checkStart()

    • getPlayersNumber

      public static java.lang.Integer getPlayersNumber()
      Number of players waiting for the game to start

    • startMultiplayerGame

      public static void startMultiplayerGame()
      Invoked to start the multiplayer game. If four players are waiting for a multiplayer game to start, the method is invoked automatically. If less than four players are waiting for the multiplayer game to start and one of them types 'START', the method is invoked 'manually'.

    • startSinglePlayerGame

      public static void startSinglePlayerGame​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Automatically invoked when a player asks to start a single player game
      Parameters:
      clientHandler -

    • add

      public static void add​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Adds a client handler waiting for a multiplayer game to start in the list if client handlers.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler -

    • printCurrentPlayers

      public static void printCurrentPlayers()

    • nicknameAlreadyExist

      public static boolean nicknameAlreadyExist​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Invoked each time a multiplayer player logs in the game. If typed nickname from the user already exists, the method returns false and the game asks to insert a different nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname -
      Returns:

    • removeClientHandler

      public static void removeClientHandler​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      If a multiplayer player waiting for a multiplayer game to start decides to exit the waiting room, the following method is invoked and the client is removed from the list of clients waiting for the game to start.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler -

    • clearParticipants

      public static void clearParticipants()

    • sendParticipantsNumberUpdate

      public static void sendParticipantsNumberUpdate()
      Updates clients about the number af participants waiting for the game to start
